H0.text: White Gem is a variety of which vegetable. Carrot

H1.text: White Gem is a variety of which vegetable. Turnip

H2.text: White Gem is a variety of which vegetable. Radish

H3.text: White Gem is a variety of which vegetable. PARSNIP

A4.text: One particular cultivar lacks the usual orange pigment due to carotene, owing its white colour to a recessive gene for tocopherol (vitamin E), but this cultivar and wild carrots do not provide nutritionally significant amounts of vitamin E.
